class_notes:
(Permission Required Prior to Enrollment)


Special topics Global Learning course on "The Scientific Research Article Since 1665." Travel to England and France 11-23 May 2024. Students are required to attend 1 Saturday fieldtrip.
course_description: Select topics or practice in rhetoric, writing, and literacy. Possible topics include writing for specific purposes, rhetorical theory, and digital literacies. May be repeated for credit when topic varies.
sections: Class Nbr: This section is full 4391, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: OXF, Meets: MW 11:30a-12:45p, Instructor: G. Reid, Status: Closed
